markdownRemark.excerpt: Since becoming a home owner for the first time, I’ve been enjoying things that have rhythm. I’m trying to lever out a little time every day for personal…
markdownRemark.html:
Since becoming a home owner for the first time, I’ve been enjoying things that have rhythm. I’m trying to lever out a little time every day for personal learning and play, amid the Möbius-like stream of house-related tasks (buying a home built in the 1950s has its moments!)

I like Roguelikes. I’m going to be doing a little of Herbert Wolverson’s excellent Roguelike Tutorial - In Rust each day. I suspect sometimes a very little.
